game.name: PAYDAY 2: Gage Ninja Pack
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Friends, it's time you learn a little something - from the Ninja.The Gage Ninja Pack DLC is the 26th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an array of Ninja weapons that Gage brought with him from his travels to the east.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Friends, it's time you learn a little something - from the Ninja.The Gage Ninja Pack DLC is the 26th DLC pack for PAYDAY 2 and adds an array of Ninja weapons that Gage brought with him from his travels to the east.
